content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Iron Smelting Setup
Consists of two stone furnaces:
- Stone furnace 1 at position(0, 0)
- Stone furnace 2 at position(2, 0)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to extract non-existent items
- Before attempting to extract items from an entity, verify that the items are actually present in the entity
- Wait for smelting process to complete before attempting to collect the output products
- Check entity status and contents before extraction attempts

### Furnace operation errors
- Ensure furnaces have both fuel and input materials before expecting output
- Monitor furnace status (NO_FUEL indicates furnace needs refueling)
- Keep track of when furnaces need refueling to maintain continuous operation
